content.rendered:
Client

Studio Size

Services

Motion

In 2017 we redesigned our agency website. The idea was to build a website that will reflect our style and philosophy. We used clean, minimalist design and displayed the art of simplicity across all devices. The website became Site of the Day on the Awwwards and got mentioned across relevant design media, which resulted in new business inquiries and more website traffic.

Since a Family Tales book is a personal and unique product, the challenge was to translate the whole range of creative possibilities through one single identity.
